item.title: HMY
item.description: score:-53 Chances: Investing in gold and other precious metals stocks is always a solid addition to any investment portfolio Gold prices have surged recently and are trading at near all-time highs Risks: The rally that catapulted U.S. equities to newer and higher valuations seems to have come to an end U.
